attr.title: LOCUST USA
attr.desc: Horror-Mystery-Exploration-Brick-Breaking with BOSS FIGHTS and 80s REFERENCES - fight a malevolent supercomputer, scour a dead guy's house for clues, collect keycards, banish a basement demon! From the master of breakout games Harley Wilson aka CURSED BOOTLEG INC. at https://hwilson.itch.io/locustusa2
attr.desc_md:
**Horror-Mystery-Exploration-Brick-Breaking** with **BOSS FIGHTS** and **80s REFERENCES**

Fight a malevolent supercomputer, scour a dead guy's house for clues, collect keycards, banish a basement demon! 

This unique game combines brick-breaking gameplay mechanics inspired by Arkanoid with exploration elements. Featuring inventive boss fights, atmospheric synthwave music, and a retro horror aesthetic reminiscent of classic 80s films and games.
